dpm.content.state
Class TaskStateChanger

java.lang.Object
  dpm.content.state.TaskStateChanger
public class TaskStateChanger
extends java.lang.Object

Sees whether a task's state can be changed, given available inputs. If so, it creates a new taskState advertisement and publishes it.

Since:
January 15, 2004, 10:47 AM

Constructor Detail

TaskStateChanger

public TaskStateChanger(net.jxta.peergroup.PeerGroup parentPG,
                        DpmAppTopFrame topFrame)
Creates a new instance of TaskStateChanger Needs: collections of tasks, task states, task inputs, and the peergroup in which to publish it. All task information is available from the peer's content storage
